doc.after: For example several voice transmitters might be identified as the command net i e top commander and direct reports in a tank battalion or tank heavy task force Another set of transmitters might identify the logistic net for that same unit An inventory of ELINT sources might identify the medium and long range counter artillery radars in a given area
